item.description:
**UPDATE*****

route map for the march is at 

https://picasaweb.google.com/chewy6i/IndiaAgainstCorruption#5593923240186611058

 

 

As you know, there is an active movement occurring in India called "India Against Corruption". This is basically passing a bill which will make for stricter anti-corruption laws. We all talk about how corruption plagues India, but this is the time to join in and give support. Maybe we can meet to talk more about this and come up with ideas.

******the fasting has been called off and a solidarity march is planned instead******
item.why: the fasting has been called off and a solidarity march is planned instead
item.name: India against Corruption
